title: How Healthy Soils Build a Strong Food Brand

tasks.task: Critically analyze the impact of conventional farming on soil health and its consequences on plant and human nutrition.
subtasks: Recognize the importance of a complex gut biome for human health.
Understand the requirement for diverse micronutrients in plants, drawing parallels to human nutrition.
Explain the natural process of plant root growth and nutrient absorption.
Differentiate between healthy, organic soil and the synthetic alternatives used in conventional farming.
Identify the shortcomings of conventional farming’s reliance on chemical fertilizers.
Evaluate the effects of nutrient-poor soil on plant quality and human nutrition.
Analyze the consequences of consuming imitation plants and the resultant food quality.
Reflect on the broader implications of relying on synthetic soil and fertilizers in agriculture.
